artist: Painter: After Jacques-André Joseph Aved; Engraver: Pieter Tanje; Publisher: Marc Michel Rey
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

in image in black: Tanjé sculps 1749 / LOUIS RACINE DE L'ACADEMY ROYAL DES INSCRIPTIONS AND BELLES LETTERS: Ne a Paris le 2 Novembre 1692 | on pedestal and placque 2 lines in Latin and 4 lines in French | below image in black: Amsterdam Chez Marc Michel Rey Libraire | on sheet in pencil: 2-453
title: Portrait of Louis Racine
